document.full_text: israel's upgraded arrow air defense system, designed to blow up ballistic missiles in space, could be rushed into deployment before its 2014-15 target date, a senior officer said thursday.
document.title: israel burnishes missile shield as mideast churns
lines_and_colors: israel's upgraded arrow air defense system, designed to blow up ballistic missiles in space, could be rushed into deployment before its 2014-15 target date, a senior officer said thursday.
